General.Name: China Grand Automotive Services Co Ltd
General.Description: China Grand Automotive Services Group Co., Ltd. engages in luxury passenger car distribution and services in China. The company operates through Automobile sales and service and Car rental service segments. It offers new and used passenger cars and spare parts, as well as provides car rental, financial leasing, repair and maintenance, and after-sales services. China Grand Automotive Services Group Co., Ltd. is based in Shanghai, China.

2.Name: Ms. Xing  Xu
2.Title: VP, Sec. of the Board of Directors  & Director
